verses.verse: The Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> is upon me; because the YY <WH3068> hath anointed <WH4886> <WH8804> me to preach good tidings <WH1319> <WH8763> unto the meek <WH6035>; he hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me to bind up <WH2280> <WH8800> the brokenhearted <WH7665> <WH8737> <WH3820>, to proclaim <WH7121> <WH8800> liberty <WH1865> to the captives <WH7617> <WH8803>, and the opening of the prison <WH6495> to them that are bound <WH631> <WH8803>;

To proclaim <WH7121> <WH8800> the acceptable <WH7522> year <WH8141> of the YY <WH3068>, and the day <WH3117> of vengeance <WH5359> of our 'Elohim <WH430>; to comfort <WH5162> <WH8763> all that mourn <WH57>;

To appoint <WH7760> <WH8800> unto them that mourn <WH57> in TZiyon <WH6726>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> unto them beauty <WH6287> for ashes <WH665>, the oil <WH8081> of joy <WH8342> for mourning <WH60>, the garment <WH4594> of praise <WH8416> for the spirit <WH7307> of heaviness <WH3544>; that they might be called <WH7121> <WH8795> trees <WH352> of righteousness <WH6664>, the planting <WH4302> of the YY <WH3068>, that he might be glorified <WH6286> <WH8692>.

And they shall build <WH1129> <WH8804> the old <WH5769> wastes <WH2723>, they shall raise up <WH6965> <WH8787> the former <WH7223> desolations <WH8074> <WH8802>, and they shall repair <WH2318> <WH8765> the waste <WH2721> cities <WH5892>, the desolations <WH8074> <WH8802> of many <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.

And strangers <WH2114> <WH8801> shall stand <WH5975> <WH8804> and feed <WH7462> <WH8804> your flocks <WH6629>, and the sons <WH1121> of the alien <WH5236> shall be your plowmen <WH406> and your vinedressers <WH3755>.

But ye shall be named <WH7121> <WH8735> the Kohanim <WH3548> of the YY <WH3068>: men shall call <WH559> <WH8735> you the Ministers <WH8334> <WH8764> of our 'Elohim <WH430>: ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> the riches <WH2428> of the goyim <WH1471>, and in their glory <WH3519> shall ye boast <WH3235> <WH8691> yourselves.

For your shame <WH1322> ye shall have double <WH4932>; and for confusion <WH3639> they shall rejoice <WH7442> <WH8799> in their portion <WH2506>: therefore in their land <WH776> they shall possess <WH3423> <WH8799> the double <WH4932>: everlasting <WH5769> joy <WH8057> shall be unto them.

For I the YY <WH3068> love <WH157> <WH8802> judgment <WH4941>, I hate <WH8130> <WH8802> robbery <WH1498> for burnt offering <WH5930>; and I will direct <WH5414> <WH8804> their work <WH6468> in truth <WH571>, and I will make <WH3772> <WH8799> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with them.

And their seed <WH2233> shall be known <WH3045> <WH8738> among the goyim <WH1471>, and their offspring <WH6631> among <WH8432> the people <WH5971>: all that see <WH7200> <WH8802> them shall acknowledge <WH5234> <WH8686> them, that they are the seed <WH2233> which the YY <WH3068> hath blessed <WH1288> <WH8765>.

I will greatly <WH7797> <WH8800> rejoice <WH7797> <WH8799> in the YY <WH3068>, my soul <WH5315> shall be joyful <WH1523> <WH8799> in my 'Elohim <WH430>; for he hath clothed <WH3847> <WH8689> me with the garments <WH899> of salvation <WH3468>, he hath covered <WH3271> <WH8804> me with the robe <WH4598> of righteousness <WH6666>, as a bridegroom <WH2860> decketh <WH3547> <WH8762> himself with ornaments <WH6287>, and as a bride <WH3618> adorneth <WH5710> <WH8799> herself with her jewels <WH3627>.

For as the earth <WH776> bringeth forth <WH3318> <WH8686> her bud <WH6780>, and as the garden <WH1593> causeht the things that are sown <WH2221> in it to spring forth <WH6779> <WH8686>; so the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> will cause righteousness <WH6666> and praise <WH8416> to spring forth <WH6779> <WH8686> before all the nations <WH1471>.
